## BaseExtensionProps.priority property

Sets the priority for the extension. Lower number means the extension is loaded first and gives it priority. `-1` is loaded before `0` and will overwrite any conflicting configuration.

Base extensions are loaded with a priority of 1.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
priority?: number;
```
